TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActionGroupResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing an ActionGroup along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetActionGroupResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetActionGroup method.

abstract member EnableReceiver : Azure.ResourceManager.Monitor.Models.ActionGroupEnableContent * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response override this.EnableReceiver : Azure.ResourceManager.Monitor.Models.ActionGroupEnableContent * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response

Docs.summary:
Enable a receiver in an action group. This changes the receiver's status from Disabled to Enabled. This operation is only supported for Email or SMS receivers.
Request Path/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Insights/actionGroups/{actionGroupName}/subscribe
Operation IdActionGroups_EnableReceiver
